# 
# Global variables 
#

# Use this to deactivate verbose mode globally for all nodes/pipelines
Verbose             true

# This variable is typically used by nodes to affect the way function calls
# within a node present status messages. But you may also use it to attach 
# the same label to all status messages from all nodes/pipelines
VerboseLabel        ''

# Activate/deactivate reporting capabilities for nodes
GenerateReport      true

VisibleFigures      false
ImageResolution     600
